participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: caring and resilient, with a nurturing spirit
participant_1.background: i have amazing children and grandchildren. i can sew my own clothes. i had cancer but its gone now. i am retired and living the great life. i do not have a smartphone.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: adventurous and enthusiastic, with a passion for culinary exploration
participant_2.background: i also like to cook but i am not very good at it. i've been trying all types of food everywhere i go. i have been traveling the world for a years. i own a yacht and i rent it out when i'm not using it. hey there i'm 23 and i love food.
